mapper.select: select * from product order by pnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into product (pnum, pname, capacity, price, stock, company, origin, pimage, inputdate ) values (productseq.nextval, #{pname},#{capacity},#{price},#{stock},#{company},#{origin},#{pimage}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update product set pname = #{pname}, capacity = #{capacity}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, comapny = #{company}, origin = #{origin}, pimage = #{pimage}, default where pnum = #{pnum}
